briefTitle: SMC Radiation Oncology Breast Cancer Cohort Study
officialTitle: Registry for Analysis of Impact of Radiation Dose to Skin on Cosmetic Outcome and Patient-reported Outcomes in Patients With Breast Cancer Treated With Radiation Therapy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer treated with curative surgery

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of thoracic radiation therapy
